titles.title: Censuring Representative Rashida Tlaib for promoting false narratives regarding the October 7, 2023, Hamas attack on Israel and for calling for the destruction of the state of Israel.
Censuring Representative Rashida Tlaib for promoting false narratives regarding the October 7, 2023, Hamas attack on Israel and for calling for the destruction of the state of Israel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ethics.

NOTIFICATION OF INTENT TO OFFER RESOLUTION - Mr. McCormick notified the House of his intent to offer a privileged resolution pursuant to clause 2(a)(1) of rule IX. The Chair announced that a determination will be made at the time designated for consideration of the resolution.

QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE - Mr. McCormick rose to a question of the privileges of the House and offered the resolution. The Chair directed the Clerk to report the resolution. Upon examination of the resolution, the Chair determined that the resolution did constitute a question of the privileges of the House.
Ms. Clark (MA) moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 208 - 213, 1 Present (Roll no. 608).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table. Agreed to without objection.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 845.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 845, the Chair put the question on agreeing to the resolution and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Raskin demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until a time to be announced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 188, 4 Present (Roll no. 622).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution censures Representative Rashida Tlaib.
